summary: The BuildRequest only asked to remove the “Draft 34” label from the footer without changing anything else. The diff summary does not provide direct code evidence that the footer text/bullet were updated, and it shows substantial unrelated application logic changes in App.tsx plus metadata changes in project_state.json.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove only the footer text that displays “Draft 34” (the live version label) while keeping the rest of the footer content and layout unchanged (including no leftover separator/bullet).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided App.tsx diff is truncated before any footer rendering, so there is no direct evidence in the diff snippet that “Draft 34” was removed and that no extra separator (e.g., “•”) remains. The file summary text claims removal, but the verifier is constrained to evidence from the diff snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed Tambola voice-announcement triggering logic (tracking lastAction, preventing announcements on undo/reset, English-only TTS routing) and related state handling in the main App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest, which only asked to remove a specific footer label without other UI/logic changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata to mention “App deployed to production (Version 35)” and added new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; it specifically disallowed implementing new versioning/publish workflows and only asked for a footer text removal.
